title: Chintz Fragments, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and purple applied over resist by brush and pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
description: Two sections of a border with birds, flowering vases and garlands. Guard border of yellow at the top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragments, early 18th century.
early 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds and purple applied over resist by brush and pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-17-a,b.
